00055 #include <stdio.h>
00056 #include "midas.h"
00057 #include "ybos.h"
00058 
00059 typedef struct {
00060 
00061    /* ODB keys */
00062    HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKeyDemand, hKeyMeasured;
00063 
00064    /* globals */
00065    INT num_channels;
00066    INT format;
00067    INT last_channel;
00068 
00069    /* items in /Variables record */
00070    float *demand;
00071    float *measured;
00072 
00073    /* items in /Settings */
00074    char *names;
00075    float *update_threshold;
00076 
00077    /* mirror arrays */
00078    float *demand_mirror;
00079    float *measured_mirror;
00080 
00081    void **driver;
00082    INT *channel_offset;
00083    void **dd_info;
00084    INT *flags;
00085 
00086 } GEN_INFO;
00087 
00088 #define DRIVER(_i) ((INT (*)(INT cmd, ...))(gen_info->driver[_i]))
00089 
00090 #ifndef abs
00091 #define abs(a) (((a) < 0)   ? -(a) : (a))
00092 #endif

00094 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00095 
00096 static void free_mem(GEN_INFO * gen_info)
00097 {
00098    free(gen_info->names);
00099    free(gen_info->demand);
00100    free(gen_info->measured);
00101 
00102    free(gen_info->update_threshold);
00103 
00104    free(gen_info->demand_mirror);
00105    free(gen_info->measured_mirror);
00106 
00107    free(gen_info->dd_info);
00108    free(gen_info->channel_offset);
00109    free(gen_info->driver);
00110    free(gen_info->flags);
00111 
00112    free(gen_info);
00113 }

00115 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00116 
00117 INT gen_read(EQUIPMENT * pequipment, int channel)
00118 {
00119    int i, status;
00120    DWORD act_time;
00121    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00122    HNDLE hDB;
00123 
00124   /*---- read measured value ----*/
00125 
00126    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00127    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00128 
00129    status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET, gen_info->dd_info[channel],
00130                              channel - gen_info->channel_offset[channel],
00131                              &gen_info->measured[channel]);
00132 
00133    /* check how much channels have changed since last ODB update */
00134    act_time = ss_millitime();
00135 
00136    /* check for update measured */
00137    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00138       /* update if change is more than update_threshold */
00139       if (abs(gen_info->measured[i] - gen_info->measured_mirror[i]) >
00140           gen_info->update_threshold[i]) {
00141          for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00142             gen_info->measured_mirror[i] = gen_info->measured[i];
00143 
00144          db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyMeasured, gen_info->measured,
00145                      sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels, gen_info->num_channels,
00146                      TID_FLOAT);
00147 
00148          pequipment->odb_out++;
00149 
00150          break;
00151       }
00152    }
00153 
00154   /*---- read demand value ----*/
00155 
00156    status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET_DEMAND, gen_info->dd_info[channel],
00157                              channel - gen_info->channel_offset[channel],
00158                              &gen_info->demand[channel]);
00159 
00160    if (gen_info->demand[channel] != gen_info->demand_mirror[channel]) {
00161       gen_info->demand_mirror[channel] = gen_info->demand[channel];
00162       db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand,
00163                   sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels, gen_info->num_channels,
00164                   TID_FLOAT);
00165    }
00166 
00167    return status;
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 
00172 void gen_demand(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00173 {
00174    INT i, status;
00175    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00176    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00177 
00178    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00179    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00180 
00181    /* set individual channels only if demand value differs */
00182    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00183       if (gen_info->demand[i] != gen_info->demand_mirror[i]) {
00184          if ((gen_info->flags[i] & DF_READ_ONLY) == 0) {
00185             status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00186                                 i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->demand[i]);
00187          }
00188          gen_info->demand_mirror[i] = gen_info->demand[i];
00189       }
00190 
00191    pequipment->odb_in++;
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00195 
00196 void gen_update_label(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00197 {
00198    INT i, status;
00199    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00200    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00201 
00202    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00203    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00204 
00205    /* update channel labels based on the midas channel names */
00206    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00207       status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00208                           i - gen_info->channel_offset[i],
00209                           gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00210 }
00211 
00212 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00213 
00214 INT gen_init(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00215 {
00216    int status, size, i, j, index, offset;
00217    char str[256];
00218    HNDLE hDB, hKey, hNames;
00219    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00220 
00221    /* allocate private data */
00222    pequipment->cd_info = calloc(1, sizeof(GEN_INFO));
00223    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00224 
00225    /* get class driver root key */
00226    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00227    sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s", pequipment->name);
00228    db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00229    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &gen_info->hKeyRoot);
00230 
00231    /* save event format */
00232    size = sizeof(str);
00233    db_get_value(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00234 
00235    if (equal_ustring(str, "Fixed"))
00236       gen_info->format = FORMAT_FIXED;
00237    else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS"))
00238       gen_info->format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00239    else if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS"))
00240       gen_info->format = FORMAT_YBOS;
00241 
00242    /* count total number of channels */
00243    for (i = 0, gen_info->num_channels = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00244       if (pequipment->driver[i].channels == 0) {
00245          cm_msg(MERROR, "gen_init", "Driver with zero channels not allowed");
00246          return FE_ERR_ODB;
00247       }
00248 
00249       gen_info->num_channels += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00250    }
00251 
00252    if (gen_info->num_channels == 0) {
00253       cm_msg(MERROR, "gen_init", "No channels found in device driver list");
00254       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00255    }
00256 
00257    /* Allocate memory for buffers */
00258    gen_info->names = (char *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, NAME_LENGTH);
00259 
00260    gen_info->demand = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00261    gen_info->measured = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00262 
00263    gen_info->update_threshold = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00264 
00265    gen_info->demand_mirror = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00266    gen_info->measured_mirror = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00267 
00268    gen_info->dd_info = (void *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00269    gen_info->channel_offset = (INT *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(INT));
00270    gen_info->driver = (void *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00271    gen_info->flags = (INT *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(INT));
00272 
00273    if (!gen_info->flags) {
00274       cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Not enough memory");
00275       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00276    }
00277 
00278   /*---- Initialize device drivers ----*/
00279 
00280    /* call init method */
00281    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00282       sprintf(str, "Settings/Devices/%s", pequipment->driver[i].name);
00283       status = db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00284       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00285          db_create_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, TID_KEY);
00286          status = db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00287          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00288             cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Cannot create %s entry in online database", str);
00289             free_mem(gen_info);
00290             return FE_ERR_ODB;
00291          }
00292       }
00293 
00294       status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_INIT, hKey, &pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00295                                         pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00296                                         pequipment->driver[i].flags,
00297                                         pequipment->driver[i].bd);
00298       if (status != FE_SUCCESS) {
00299          free_mem(gen_info);
00300          return status;
00301       }
00302    }
00303 
00304    /* compose device driver channel assignment */
00305    for (i = 0, j = 0, index = 0, offset = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++, j++) {
00306       while (j >= pequipment->driver[index].channels && pequipment->driver[index].name[0]) {
00307          offset += j;
00308          index++;
00309          j = 0;
00310       }
00311 
00312       gen_info->driver[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd;
00313       gen_info->dd_info[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd_info;
00314       gen_info->channel_offset[i] = offset;
00315       gen_info->flags[i] = pequipment->driver[index].flags;
00316    }
00317 
00318   /*---- create demand variables ----*/
00319 
00320    /* get demand from ODB */
00321    status =
00322        db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00323    if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
00324       size = sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00325       db_get_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand, &size, TID_FLOAT);
00326    }
00327    /* let device driver overwrite demand values, if it supports it */
00328    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00329       if (gen_info->flags[i] & DF_PRIO_DEVICE) {
00330          DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEMAND, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00331                     i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], &gen_info->demand[i]);
00332          gen_info->demand_mirror[i] = gen_info->demand[i];
00333       } else
00334          gen_info->demand_mirror[i] = -12345.f; /* use -12345 as invalid value */
00335    }
00336    /* write back demand values */
00337    status =
00338        db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00339    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00340       db_create_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", TID_FLOAT);
00341       db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00342    }
00343    size = sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00344    db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand, size,
00345                gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00346    db_open_record(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand,
00347                   gen_info->num_channels * sizeof(float), MODE_READ, gen_demand,
00348                   pequipment);
00349 
00350   /*---- create measured variables ----*/
00351    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured",
00352                  gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels,
00353                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00354    db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured", &gen_info->hKeyMeasured);
00355    memcpy(gen_info->measured_mirror, gen_info->measured,
00356           gen_info->num_channels * sizeof(float));
00357 
00358   /*---- get default names from device driver ----*/
00359    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00360       sprintf(gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i, "Default%%CH %d", i);
00361       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00362                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00363    }
00364    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names",
00365                  gen_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * gen_info->num_channels,
00366                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_STRING);
00367 
00368   /*---- set labels form midas SC names ----*/
00369    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00370       gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00371       DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00372                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00373    }
00374 
00375    /* open hotlink on channel names */
00376    if (db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names", &hNames) == DB_SUCCESS)
00377       db_open_record(hDB, hNames, gen_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * gen_info->num_channels,
00378                      MODE_READ, gen_update_label, pequipment);
00379 
00380   /*---- get default update threshold from device driver ----*/
00381    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00382       gen_info->update_threshold[i] = 2.f;      /* default 2 units */
00383       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00384                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], &gen_info->update_threshold[i]);
00385    }
00386    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Update Threshold Measured",
00387                  gen_info->update_threshold, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels,
00388                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00389 
00390   /*---- set initial demand values ----*/
00391    gen_demand(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, pequipment);
00392 
00393    /* initially read all channels */
00394    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00395       gen_read(pequipment, i);
00396 
00397    return FE_SUCCESS;
00398 }
00399 
00400 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401 
00402 INT gen_exit(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00403 {
00404    INT i;
00405 
00406    free_mem((GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info);
00407 
00408    /* call exit method of device drivers */
00409    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].dd != NULL; i++)
00410       pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_EXIT, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info);
00411 
00412    return FE_SUCCESS;
00413 }
00414 
00415 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00416 
00417 INT gen_idle(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00418 {
00419    INT act, status;
00420    DWORD act_time;
00421    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00422 
00423    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00424 
00425    /* select next measurement channel */
00426    act_time = ss_millitime();
00427    act = (gen_info->last_channel + 1) % gen_info->num_channels;
00428 
00429    /* measure channel */
00430    status = gen_read(pequipment, act);
00431    gen_info->last_channel = act;
00432 
00433    return status;
00434 }
00435 
00436 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00437 
00438 INT cd_gen_read(char *pevent, int offset)
00439 {
00440    float *pdata;
00441    DWORD *pdw;
00442    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00443    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00444 
00445    pequipment = *((EQUIPMENT **) pevent);
00446    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00447 
00448    if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
00449       memcpy(pevent, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00450       pevent += sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00451 
00452       memcpy(pevent, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00453       pevent += sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00454 
00455       return 2 * sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00456    } else if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
00457       bk_init(pevent);
00458 
00459       /* create DMND bank */
00460       bk_create(pevent, "DMND", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00461       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00462       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00463       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00464 
00465       /* create MSRD bank */
00466       bk_create(pevent, "MSRD", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00467       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00468       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00469       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00470 
00471       return bk_size(pevent);
00472    } else if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_YBOS) {
00473       ybk_init((DWORD *) pevent);
00474 
00475       /* create EVID bank */
00476       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "EVID", I4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) (&pdw));
00477       *(pdw)++ = EVENT_ID(pevent);      /* Event_ID + Mask */
00478       *(pdw)++ = SERIAL_NUMBER(pevent); /* Serial number */
00479       *(pdw)++ = TIME_STAMP(pevent);    /* Time Stamp */
00480       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdw);
00481 
00482       /* create DMND bank */
00483       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "DMND", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00484       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00485       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00486       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00487 
00488       /* create MSRD bank */
00489       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "MSRD", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00490       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00491       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00492       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00493 
00494       return ybk_size((DWORD *) pevent);
00495    } else
00496       return 0;
00497 }
00498 
00499 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00500 
00501 INT cd_gen(INT cmd, EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00502 {
00503    INT status;
00504 
00505    switch (cmd) {
00506    case CMD_INIT:
00507       status = gen_init(pequipment);
00508       break;
00509 
00510    case CMD_EXIT:
00511       status = gen_exit(pequipment);
00512       break;
00513 
00514    case CMD_IDLE:
00515       status = gen_idle(pequipment);
00516       break;
00517 
00518    default:
00519       cm_msg(MERROR, "Generic class driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00520       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00521       break;
00522    }
00523 
00524    return status;
00525 }
